data.title: Alphabetical Master List of '60s Films - A & B — Cinema60
data.meta_description: An alphabetical list of all 1960s films that start with “A” and “B”
data.text:
A

• The Absent Minded Professor (1961, Director: Robert Stevenson | Stars: Fred MacMurray, Nancy Olson, Keenan Wynn, Tommy Kirk)

• Accattone (1961, Director: Pier Paolo Pasolini | Stars: Franco Citti, Franca Pasut, Silvana Corsini, Paola Guidi) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #10 - Kiss, Marry, Kill in the 60s: 1961 Edition)

• Accident (1967, Director: Joseph Losey | Stars: Dirk Bogarde, Stanley Baker, Jacqueline Sassard, Michael York)

• Ace High (1968, Director: Giuseppe Colizzi | Stars: Terence Hill, Bud Spencer, Eli Wallach, Brock Peters)

• Ada (1961, Director: Daniel Mann | Stars: Susan Hayward, Dean Martin, Wilfrid Hyde-White, Ralph Meeker) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Adventures of Goopy and Bagha (1969, Director: Satyajit Ray | Stars: Tapan Chatterjee, Rabi Ghosh, Ajoy Banerjee, Iva Banerjee)

• Advise & Consent (1962, Director: Otto Preminger | Stars: Franchot Tone, Lew Ayres, Henry Fonda, Walter Pidgeon)

• After the Fox (1966, Director: Vittorio De Sica | Stars: Peter Sellers, Victor Mature, Britt Ekland, Martin Balsam)

• Age of Consent (1969, Director: Michael Powell | Stars: James Mason, Helen Mirren, Jack MacGowran, Neva Carr-Glynn)

• The Agony and the Ecstasy (1965, Director: Carol Reed | Stars: Charlton Heston, Rex Harrison, Diane Cilento, Harry Andrews)

• The Alamo (1960, Director: John Wayne | Stars: John Wayne, Richard Widmark, Laurence Harvey, Frankie Avalon)

• Alfie (1966, Director: Lewis Gilbert | Stars: Michael Caine, Shelley Winters, Millicent Martin, Julia Foster) (Read Jenna's review)

• Alice's Restaurant (1969, Director: Arthur Penn | Stars: Arlo Guthrie, Patricia Quinn, James Broderick, Pete Seeger)

• All in a Night's Work (1961, Director: Joseph Anthony | Stars: Dean Martin, Shirley MacLaine, Cliff Robertson, Charles Ruggles) (Read Jenna's review)

• All Monsters Attack (1969, Directors: Ishirô Honda, Jun Fukuda | Stars: Kenji Sahara, Machiko Naka, Tomonori Yazaki, Hideyo Amamoto)

• All Night Long (1962, Director: Basil Dearden | Stars: Patrick McGoohan, Keith Michell, Betsy Blair, Paul Harris) (Read Jenna's review)

• All the Sins of Sodom (1968, Director: Joseph W. Sarno | Stars: Dan Machuen, Sue Akers, Morris Kaplan, Maria Lease) (Read Jenna's review)

• Alphaville (1965, Director: Jean-Luc Godard | Stars: Eddie Constantine, Anna Karina, Akim Tamiroff, Valérie Boisgel) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #3 - Anna Karina With Godard in the 60s)

• Alvarez Kelly (1966, Director: Edward Dmytryk | Stars: William Holden, Richard Widmark, Janice Rule, Patrick O'Neal)

• Always on Sunday (1965, Director: Ken Russell | Stars: James Lloyd, Annette Robertson, Bryan Pringle, Jacqui Cook) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Amazing Transparent Man (1960, Director: Edgar G. Ulmer | Stars: Marguerite Chapman, Douglas Kennedy, James Griffith, Ivan Triesault)

• The Ambushers (1967, Director: Henry Levin | Stars: Dean Martin, Senta Berger, Janice Rule, James Gregory) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #14 - Bootleg Bond in the 60s - Derek Flint and Matt Helm)

• America America (1963, Director: Elia Kazan | Stars: Stathis Giallelis, Frank Wolff, Elena Karam, Harry Davis)

• The Americanization of Emily (1964, Director: Arthur Hiller | Stars: James Garner, Julie Andrews, Melvyn Douglas, James Coburn) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #30 - Kiss Marry Kill in the 60s: 1964)

• Amphibian Man (1962, Directors: Vladimir Chebotaryov, Gennadiy Kazanskiy | Stars: Vladimir Korenev, Anastasiya Vertinskaya, Mikhail Kozakov, Nikolai Simonov)

• An Actor's Revenge (1963, Director: Kon Ichikawa | Stars: Kazuo Hasegawa, Fujiko Yamamoto, Ayako Wakao, Eiji Funakoshi)

• An Autumn Afternoon (1962, Director: Yasujirô Ozu | Stars: Chishû Ryû, Shima Iwashita, Keiji Sada, Mariko Okada)

• Andrei Rublev (1966, Director: Andrei Tarkovsky | Stars: Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Ivan Lapikov, Nikolay Grinko, Nikolay Sergeev)

• Angélique (1964, Director: Bernard Borderie | Stars: Michèle Mercier, Robert Hossein, Jean Rochefort, Claude Giraud)

• Anna (1967, Director: Pierre Koralnik | Stars: Anna Karina, Jean-Claude Brialy, Marianne Faithfull, Serge Gainsbourg) (Read Jenna's review)

• Anne of the Thousand Days (1969, Director: Charles Jarrott | Stars: Richard Burton, Geneviève Bujold, Irene Papas, Anthony Quayle)

• The Anniversary (1968, Director: Roy Ward Baker | Stars: Bette Davis, Sheila Hancock, Jack Hedley, James Cossins)

• Any Number Can Win (1963, Director: Henri Verneuil | Stars: Jean Gabin, Alain Delon, Claude Cerval, Viviane Romance)

• Anzio (1968, Directors: Edward Dmytryk, Duilio Coletti | Stars: Robert Mitchum, Peter Falk, Robert Ryan, Earl Holliman)

• The Apartment (1960, Director: Billy Wilder | Stars: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray, Ray Walston) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Appaloosa (1966, Director: Sidney J. Furie | Stars: Marlon Brando, Anjanette Comer, John Saxon, Emilio Fernández)

• Arabesque (1966, Director: Stanley Donen | Stars: Gregory Peck, Sophia Loren, Alan Badel, Kieron Moore) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #29 - Sophia Loren in the 60s)

• Army of Shadows (1969, Director: Jean-Pierre Melville | Stars: Lino Ventura, Paul Meurisse, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Simone Signoret)

• The Arrangement (1969, Director: Elia Kazan | Stars: Kirk Douglas, Faye Dunaway, Deborah Kerr, Richard Boone)

• The Assassin (1961, Director: Elio Petri | Stars: Marcello Mastroianni, Micheline Presle, Cristina Gaioni, Salvo Randone) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Assassination Bureau (1969, Director: Basil Dearden | Stars: Oliver Reed, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas, Curd Jürgens)

• Asterix and Cleopatra (1968, Directors: René Goscinny, Albert Uderzo | Stars: Roger Carel, Jacques Morel, Micheline Dax, Jacques Balutin)

• Asterix the Gaul (1967, Director: Ray Goossens | Stars: Roger Carel, Jacques Morel, Pierre Tornade, Jacques Jouanneau)

• The Astro-Zombies (1968, Director: Ted V. Mikels | Stars: Wendell Corey, John Carradine, Tom Pace, Joan Patrick)

• At Midnight I'll Take Your Soul (1964, Director: José Mojica Marins | Stars: José Mojica Marins, Magda Mei, Nivaldo Lima, Valéria Vasquez)

• Au Hasard Balthazar (1966, Director: Robert Bresson | Stars: Anne Wiazemsky, Walter Green, François Lafarge, Jean-Claude Guilbert) (Read Jenna's review)

B

• Babes in Toyland (1961, Director: Jack Donohue | Stars: Ray Bolger, Tommy Sands, Annette Funicello, Ed Wynn)

• Babo 73 (1964, Director: Robert Downey Sr. | Stars: Taylor Mead, Jim Antonio, Tom Gaines, James Greene) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Bad Sleep Well (1960, Director: Akira Kurosawa | Stars: Toshirô Mifune, Masayuki Mori, Kyôko Kagawa, Tatsuya Mihashi)

• The Bamboo Saucer (1968, Director: Frank Telford | Stars: Dan Duryea, John Ericson, Lois Nettleton, Bob Hastings) (Read Jenna's review)

• Band of Outsiders (1964, Director: Jean-Luc Godard | Stars: Anna Karina, Claude Brasseur, Danièle Girard, Louisa Colpeyn) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #3 - Anna Karina With Godard in the 60s)

• Bandolero! (1968, Director: Andrew V. McLaglen | Stars: James Stewart, Dean Martin, Raquel Welch, George Kennedy)

• Barabbas (1961, Director: Richard Fleischer | Stars: Anthony Quinn, Silvana Mangano, Arthur Kennedy, Katy Jurado)

• Barbarella (1968, Director: Roger Vadim | Stars: Jane Fonda, John Phillip Law, Anita Pallenberg, Milo O'Shea) (Read Jenna's review)

• Barefoot in the Park (1967, Director: Gene Saks | Stars: Robert Redford, Jane Fonda, Charles Boyer, Mildred Natwick)

• Barren Lives (1963, Director: Nelson Pereira dos Santos | Stars: Átila Iório, Maria Ribeiro, Orlando Macedo, Joffre Soares) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #19 - Brazilian Cinema Novo in the 60s)

• Barrier (1966, Director: Jerzy Skolimowski | Stars: Joanna Szczerbic, Jan Nowicki, Tadeusz Lomnicki, Maria Malicka) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #9 - Polish Arthouse Cinema in the 60s)

• Batman (1966, Director: Leslie H. Martinson | Stars: Adam West, Burt Ward, Lee Meriwether, Cesar Romero)

• The Battle of Algiers (1966, Director: Gillo Pontecorvo | Stars: Brahim Hadjadj, Jean Martin, Yacef Saadi, Samia Kerbash)

• Battle of Britain (1969, Director: Guy Hamilton | Stars: Michael Caine, Trevor Howard, Harry Andrews, Curd Jürgens)

• The Battle of Neretva (1969, Director: Veljko Bulajic | Stars: Yul Brynner, Hardy Krüger, Franco Nero, Sylva Koscina)

• Battle of the Bulge (1965, Director: Ken Annakin | Stars: Henry Fonda, Robert Shaw, Robert Ryan, Dana Andrews)

• Bay of Angels (1963, Director: Jacques Demy | Stars: Jeanne Moreau, Claude Mann, Paul Guers, Henri Nassiet)

• Beach Blanket Bingo (1965, Director: William Asher | Stars: Frankie Avalon, Annette Funicello, Deborah Walley, Harvey Lembeck)

• Beach Party (1963, Director: William Asher | Stars: Robert Cummings, Dorothy Malone, Frankie Avalon, Annette Funicello)

• The Beast of Yucca Flats (1961, Director: Coleman Francis | Stars: Douglas Mellor, Barbara Francis, Bing Stafford, Larry Aten)

• Beatles Electroniques (1969, Directors: Nam June Paik, Jud Yalkut)

• Becket (1964, Director: Peter Glenville | Stars: Richard Burton, Peter O'Toole, John Gielgud, Gino Cervi)

• The Bed Sitting Room (1969, Director: Richard Lester | Stars: Rita Tushingham, Ralph Richardson, Peter Cook, Dudley Moore)

• Bedazzled (1967, Director: Stanley Donen | Stars: Peter Cook, Dudley Moore, Eleanor Bron, Raquel Welch) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #20 - The Faust Legend in the 60s)

• The Bedford Incident (1965, Director: James B. Harris | Stars: Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, James MacArthur, Martin Balsam)

• Before the Revolution (1964, Director: Bernardo Bertolucci | Stars: Adriana Asti, Francesco Barilli, Allen Midgette, Morando Morandini)

• Be-In (1967, Director: Jerry Abrams | Stars: Lawrence Ferlinghetti, Allen Ginsberg, Lenore Kandel, Timothy Leary) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #13 - LSD Movies in 1967)

• Bell' Antonio (1960, Director: Mauro Bolognini | Stars: Marcello Mastroianni, Claudia Cardinale, Pierre Brasseur, Rina Morelli) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Bellboy (1960, Director: Jerry Lewis | Stars: Jerry Lewis, Alex Gerry, Bob Clayton, Sonnie Sands) (Read Jenna's review)

• Belle de Jour (1967, Director: Luis Buñuel | Stars: Catherine Deneuve, Jean Sorel, Michel Piccoli, Geneviève Page) (Read Jenna's review)

• Bells Are Ringing (1960, Director: Vincente Minnelli | Stars: Judy Holliday, Dean Martin, Fred Clark, Eddie Foy Jr.) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Best Man (1964, Director: Franklin J. Schaffner | Stars: Henry Fonda, Cliff Robertson, Edie Adams, Margaret Leighton)

• Beware of the Car (1966, Director: Eldar Ryazanov | Stars: Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy, Oleg Efremov, Lyubov Dobrzhanskaya, Anatoliy Papanov)

• The Bible: In the Beginning... (1966, Director: John Huston | Stars: Michael Parks, Ulla Bergryd, Richard Harris, John Huston)

• The Big City (1963, Director: Satyajit Ray | Stars: Anil Chatterjee, Madhabi Mukherjee, Jaya Bachchan, Haren Chatterjee) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #21 - Kiss, Marry, Kill in the 60s: 1963)

• The Big Gundown (1966, Director: Sergio Sollima | Stars: Lee Van Cleef, Tomas Milian, Walter Barnes, Nieves Navarro)

• A Big Hand for the Little Lady (1966, Director: Fielder Cook | Stars: Henry Fonda, Joanne Woodward, Jason Robards, Paul Ford)

• The Big Shave (1967, Director: Martin Scorsese | Star: Peter Bernuth)

• Billion Dollar Brain (1967, Director: Ken Russell | Stars: Michael Caine, Karl Malden, Ed Begley, Oskar Homolka) (Read Jenna's review) (Read Bart's review)

• Billy Budd (1962, Director: Peter Ustinov | Stars: Robert Ryan, Peter Ustinov, Melvyn Douglas, Paul Rogers)

• Billy Liar (1963, Director: John Schlesinger | Stars: Tom Courtenay, Julie Christie, Wilfred Pickles, Mona Washbourne)

• Birdman of Alcatraz (1962, Directors: John Frankenheimer, Charles Crichton | Stars: Burt Lancaster, Karl Malden, Thelma Ritter, Neville Brand)

• The Birds (1963, Director: Alfred Hitchcock | Stars: Rod Taylor, Tippi Hedren, Jessica Tandy, Suzanne Pleshette)

• Black Girl (1966, Director: Ousmane Sembene | Stars: Mbissine Thérèse Diop, Anne-Marie Jelinek, Robert Fontaine, Momar Nar Sene)

• Black God, White Devil (1964, Director: Glauber Rocha | Stars: Geraldo Del Rey, Yoná Magalhães, Othon Bastos, Maurício do Valle) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #19 - Brazilian Cinema Novo in the 60s)

• Black Panthers (1968, Director: Agnès Varda | Stars: H. Rap Brown, Stokely Carmichael, Eldridge Cleaver, Kathleen Cleaver) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #11 - Agnes Varda in the 60s)

• Black Peter (1964, Director: Milos Forman | Stars: Ladislav Jakim, Pavla Martinkova, Jan Vostrcil, Bozena Matuskova)

• Black Sabbath (1963, Director: Mario Bava | Stars: Michèle Mercier, Lidia Alfonsi, Boris Karloff, Mark Damon)

• Black Sunday (1960, Director: Mario Bava | Stars: Barbara Steele, John Richardson, Andrea Checchi, Ivo Garrani)

• The Black Tulip (1964, Director: Christian-Jaque | Stars: Alain Delon, Virna Lisi, Dawn Addams, Adolfo Marsillach)

• Blackbeard's Ghost (1968, Director: Robert Stevenson | Stars: Peter Ustinov, Dean Jones, Suzanne Pleshette, Elsa Lanchester)

• Blast of Silence (1961, Director: Allen Baron | Stars: Allen Baron, Molly McCarthy, Larry Tucker, Peter Clune)

• Blind Beast (1969, Director: Yasuzô Masumura | Stars: Eiji Funakoshi, Mako Midori, Noriko Sengoku)

• Blood and Black Lace (1964, Director: Mario Bava | Stars: Cameron Mitchell, Eva Bartok, Thomas Reiner, Arianna Gorini)

• Blood Feast (1963, Director: Herschell Gordon Lewis | Stars: William Kerwin, Mal Arnold, Connie Mason, Lyn Bolton)

• Bloodlust! (1961, Director: Ralph Brooke | Stars: Wilton Graff, June Kenney, Walter Brooke, Robert Reed)

• Blow-Up (1966, Director: Michelangelo Antonioni | Stars: David Hemmings, Vanessa Redgrave, Sarah Miles, John Castle) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #16 - Michelangelo Antonioni in the 60s)

• Blue Hawaii (1961, Director: Norman Taurog | Stars: Elvis Presley, Joan Blackman, Angela Lansbury, Nancy Walters) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Blue Max (1966, Director: John Guillermin | Stars: George Peppard, James Mason, Ursula Andress, Jeremy Kemp)

• Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice (1969, Director: Paul Mazursky | Stars: Natalie Wood, Robert Culp, Elliott Gould, Dyan Cannon) (Read Jenna's review)

• Boccaccio '70 (1962, Directors: Vittorio De Sica, Federico Fellini, Mario Monicelli, Luchino Visconti | Stars: Anita Ekberg, Sophia Loren, Romy Schneider, Marisa Solinas) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #29 - Sophia Loren in the 60s)

• Boeing, Boeing (1965, Director: John Rich | Stars: Tony Curtis, Jerry Lewis, Dany Saval, Christiane Schmidtmer)

• Bonnie and Clyde (1967, Director: Arthur Penn | Stars: Warren Beatty, Faye Dunaway, Michael J. Pollard, Gene Hackman) (Read Jenna's review) (Ep #26 - Pauline Kael's '60s Pick: Bonnie & Clyde)

• The Boom (1963, Director: Vittorio De Sica | Stars: Alberto Sordi, Gianna Maria Canale, Elena Nicolai, Ettore Geri) (Read Jenna's review)

• The Boston Strangler (1968, Director: Richard Fleischer | Stars: Tony Curtis, Henry Fonda, George Kennedy, Mike Kellin)

• A Boy Named Charlie Brown (1969, Director: Bill Melendez | Stars: Peter Robbins, Pamelyn Ferdin, Glenn Gilger, Andy Pforsich)

• Breathless (1960, Director: Jean-Luc Godard | Stars: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Jean Seberg, Daniel Boulanger, Henri-Jacques Huet)

• The Bride Wore Black (1968, Director: François Truffaut | Stars: Jeanne Moreau, Jean-Claude Brialy, Michel Bouquet, Charles Denner)
